member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.ShadowEffect
member.summary: Generates a shadow from the alpha channel of an image. The shadow is more opaque for higher alpha values and more transparent for lower alpha values. You can set the amount of blur and the color of the shadow.

remarks.p: To add a drop shadow to an image, use the shadow effect, translate it by the desired shadow offset, then composite the original image over the top.
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Shadow effect.
